name: Expedition Hub
desc: Sends expeditions to uninhabited planets in nearby starsystems. The fleets collect resources and attempt to make their way back to the colony. On successful return it will unload the resources and distribute its findings through the industry, the acquired materials being determined by the properties of the planet the expedition visited.

name: Advanced Asteroid Mining
desc: Constructs the required facilities both in form of spacedocks and in form of space-to-surface transport systems to match the mining output of planetary installations, overcoming the potential lack of resources on the planet itself, bringing in a stable supply of most unrefined resources.
